name: EnCase Logical Evidence File
summary: An L01 file is a logical evidence file created by OpenText EnCase Forensic. It contains a subset of data (files and filenames) copied from an EnCase evidence ( .E01 ) file. Users often save an E01 file's most noteworthy data as an L01 file, for quicker access and review.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
